info.name: CallSense Backend API
info.description: Collection for testing CallSense Backend - Audio file prediction with AI voice detection and risk classification

request.description: Welcome endpoint - returns service info and timestamp
Get backend service status and version

Upload an audio file (MP3, WAV, M4A) for AI voice detection and risk assessment

Supported formats: .mp3, .wav, .m4a

Response includes:
- filename: Uploaded file name
- y_prob: {human: number, nonhuman: number} (probabilities 0-1 from model)
- risk:
  - level: Risk classification string
  - trustability: Trustability percentage (0-100)
  - riskType: One of 'scam', 'suspicious', 'safe'

Risk Classification:
- High Risk (AI voice) → riskType: 'scam' (nonhuman >= 0.80)
- Medium Risk (Suspicious) → riskType: 'suspicious' (0.40 <= nonhuman < 0.80)
- Low Risk (Human) → riskType: 'safe' (nonhuman < 0.40)

Retrieve all prediction records from CSV database

Returns:
- total: Total number of records
- records: Array of prediction records with:
  - timestamp: When prediction was made
  - filename: Audio file name analyzed
  - human_score: Human voice probability (0-1)
  - nonhuman_score: AI voice probability (0-1)
  - risk_level: Classification level string
  - actual_label: Manual verification label (PENDING or verified)
